document_data.caption: A blood amniote rising up.
document_data.name: Blood Amniote
document_data.mainbody: '''Blood amniotes''' were a type of [[undead]] [[ooze]] made of congealed blood and which gorged on blood.
document_data.Description: Blood amniotes were composed of hundreds of dead bodies that had died within close proximity of each other.
document_data.Combat: Blood amniotes would sneak up behind their prey and attempt to grapple them with numerous grasping tendrils, then proceed to drain blood from their victim's body.
document_data.History: Around the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, one could occasionally find blood amniotes within the [[Dungeon of the Crypt]].<ref>{{Cite dungeon/127/Vampires of Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Crypt|67}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends:
Scholars were uncertain as to the exact origin of blood amniotes, with debates split between spontaneous formation or artificial creation through [[necromancy|necromantic]] rituals involving mass sacrifice.

One legend claimed that they inadvertently came about due to the actions of [[priest]]s of [[Orcus]]. The legend stated that the priests unleashed a storm of burning blood against two opposing armies and that from this mass slaughter arose the first blood amniotes.
